name: remote-visual-debugger
description: Comprehensive remote visual debugging toolkit for browser applications, React development, and web performance analysis by ae.ltd
features: Remote browser debugging with advanced visual inspection capabilities
React component analysis with props, state, and performance profiling
Real-time performance monitoring with Core Web Vitals tracking
Comprehensive error tracking with stack trace analysis and resolution suggestions
Visual DOM inspection with interactive element highlighting and modification
Network request monitoring with detailed timing analysis and optimization recommendations
Cross-browser compatibility testing with automated screenshot comparison
use_cases: Remote debugging of production web applications and performance issues
React component optimization with detailed state and props analysis
Visual regression testing with automated screenshot comparison
Performance bottleneck identification and optimization recommendations
Cross-browser compatibility testing and issue resolution

performance_metrics.performance_analysis: Real-time Core Web Vitals monitoring with 95% accuracy
performance_metrics.error_detection: Automated error tracking with intelligent root cause analysis
performance_metrics.visual_inspection: Interactive DOM analysis with element-level debugging
performance_metrics.react_optimization: Component performance profiling with 85% accuracy improvement

remote_browser_debugging.visual_inspection: Interactive DOM inspection with element highlighting and modification
remote_browser_debugging.console_analysis: Real-time console output monitoring with error categorization
remote_browser_debugging.network_monitoring: HTTP request analysis with timing breakdown and optimization suggestions
remote_browser_debugging.performance_profiling: Comprehensive performance metrics with bottleneck identification

react_development_tools.component_analysis: Deep React component inspection with props, state, and context analysis
react_development_tools.performance_profiling: Component render performance analysis with optimization recommendations
react_development_tools.state_flow_tracking: State change tracking with visualization and debugging tools
react_development_tools.hook_inspection: React hooks debugging with dependency analysis and optimization

visual_debugging.screenshot_comparison: Automated visual regression testing with pixel-perfect comparison
visual_debugging.element_highlighting: Interactive element selection with CSS inspection and modification
visual_debugging.layout_analysis: Box model visualization with spacing and positioning debugging
visual_debugging.responsive_testing: Multi-device testing with interactive viewport simulation
